Fungal - Core


Packages
com.github.fungal.api This package contains the main API for the Fungal kernel
com.github.fungal.api.classloading Class loader subsystem interface for the Fungal kernel.
com.github.fungal.api.configuration Configuration files for the Fungal kernel.
com.github.fungal.api.deployer Interface for the main deployers for the Fungal kernel.
com.github.fungal.api.events Event subsystem interface for the Fungal kernel.
com.github.fungal.api.remote The Command interface represents a command that can be invoked remotely.
com.github.fungal.bootstrap This package contains the classes needed to work with bootstrap.xml
com.github.fungal.cli The command line interface for the Fungal kernel.
com.github.fungal.deployers This package contains the deployer infrastructure for Fungal
com.github.fungal.deployment This package contains the classes needed to work with bean deployment XML files
com.github.fungal.impl This package contains the Fungal kernel implementation
com.github.fungal.impl.classloader This package contains the various class loaders for the Fungal kernel implementation
com.github.fungal.impl.remote This package contains the classes that implements the remote communication protocol for the Fungal kernel.
com.github.fungal.impl.remote.commands This package contains commands for remote communication
com.github.fungal.util This package contains various utilities for the Fungal kernel.
